div.p: Atlantic Southern Ocean sector surface temperature and salinity anomalous response to LM eruptions (Yr + 1). DJF composite response to the selected eruptions only showing Yr + 1 for (a) SST [°C] and (b) Salinity anomalies. Vectors show the wind stress anomaly [N m −2]. For SST and Salinity only regions that are significant at 90% are shown.
